title: HTML
subTitle: This is a subtitle
overviewContent: I am highly skilled in using HTML to structure web applications with a strong focus on accessibility, user experience, and SEO (Search engine optimisation). By adhering to W3C standards, I ensure that websites are not only visually appealing but also search engine optimised. I regularly collaborate with UI/UX designers to translate design concepts into fully functional, responsive web pages, while ensuring the structure supports efficient front-end performance.
